etymology.description: Depicts a person with long hair -> represents long hair
etymology.interpretation: The character 髟(biāo, "hair") is a pictogram, symbolizing a person adorned with long hair, emphasizing its characteristic texture and appearance.

examples.chinese: 她的髟柔顺如丝(她的髟柔順如絲)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de biāo róushùn rú sī.
examples.english: Her hair is as smooth as silk.

examples.chinese: 他每天早上花时间整理髟(他每天早上花時間整理髟)，保持整洁(保持整潔)。
examples.pinyin: Tā měitiān zǎoshang huā shíjiān zhěnglǐ biāo, bǎochí zhěngjié.
examples.english: He spends time every morning tidying his hair, keeping it neat.

examples.chinese: 这本字典详细介绍了髟的历史(這本字典詳細介紹了髟的歷史)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè běn zìdiǎn xiángxì jièshào le biāo de lìshǐ.
examples.english: This dictionary details the history of the hair radical.
